title: Music
excerpt: An interesting piece of trivia, I'm deeply in love with music and mixes. My favorite genres include Pop, Blues, Dance, Pop Rock, Alternative Rock, Indie Rock and Hip-Hop. Find out my favorite artists and tracks in my music profile.

title: Software
excerpt: I have been a coordinator of the Website Information and Networks Group (WING) at IIT Mandi for over 3 years, where I learnt interesting cool stuff about computers and the Web. I program mainly in C#.NET, Ruby and JavaScript.

title: Digital Art
excerpt: Creating digital art allows me to express my creativity and imagination. I enjoy experimenting with different styles and techniques to produce unique and visually appealing pieces. My work often includes a mix of traditional and modern elements, reflecting my diverse artistic influences.

title: Prose
excerpt: I love to travel and explore new places. I have been to 10 states in India and 2 countries. I have a collection of travel photos on my Instagram profile.

title: Gaming
excerpt: I love to read books. I have a collection of books on my Goodreads profile.

title: Cartography
excerpt: I love to watch movies. I have a collection of movies on my Letterboxd profile.
